caption.p: Heatmap describing the impact of varying virus virulence and survival trait values assessed across four key epidemic metrics: these heatmaps express the change in ( A) the number of infected individuals (asymptomatic and symptomatic) at the epidemic peak; ( B) the rate at which the epidemic peak is reached, t max −1; ( C) the total infected population after 30 days; and ( D) the basic reproductive ratio ( R 0) when virulence and survival are modulated by ±5% within the model. Contour lines are available for clarity.
